---
name: Test Failures
about: A feature or scenario is failing
title: "[Feature File Name] [Scenario] has test failures"
labels: Test Failures
assignees: ''

---

# A Test is failing
1. Discover why test is failing

## If test is in Semoss Application
1. Mark this test with tag @ApplicationBugFailure
2. Follow the process of creating and issue for an ApplicationBugFailure

## If test is failing due to an issue in E2E
1. Fix the issue

# After going over steps above
1. Push changes and make a pull request


# Additional Context and Debug logs below
